text:
[singing]
♪ They're Disney Chibis
With their own TV show ♪

♪ Together for the better
or the worse ♪

♪ We mashed up every story
in our laboratory ♪

♪ Smash cut
to the Chibiverse ♪

♪ They're Disney Chibis
With their own TV show ♪

♪ A monumental
cartoon science fuzz ♪

-♪ Does it all make sense? ♪
-♪ Who cares? ♪
♪ Disney presents ♪

♪ Chibi, Chibi, Chibi, Chibi
Chibi, Chibi, Chibiverse! ♪
[♪ instrumental music playing]

-[engine whirring]
-[Star] They were
the biggest names

-in Chibi music.
-[fans cheering]

Their rise and fall
is one for the
chibistory books...

I'm talking about,
The Quackstreet Boys.
They're so dang cute!

We were everywhere,
we were every... thing.

We started out the way
most boy bands do.
At a haunted mansion!

-[eerie sounds]
-[Cricket] My boys and I

were at the haunted mansion
that night.

Being cool and brave,
the way we always are.

-[growls]
-[screams in harmony] Ah!
[girls giggling]

That was the moment
everything changed.

[Dewey] I don't remember
who came up with the name
"Quackstreet Boys"
only that we were obsessed

as soon as I-- uh,
someone said it.

What a lot of people forget
is that these boys were
actually friends first,

band second, cuties third,
hotties fourth...

[Cricket] I remember when
we were first starting out.

It was all about music
and friendship.

[Barry] Four of us
were equals.

Like a friend rectangle.
I mean square.

We were roughin' it
for almost 12 whole minutes
before we got discovered.
But lucky for us...

it was by the most
well connected,

and ruthless music producer
in town.

When you've been
in this business
as long as I have,

you know talent
when ya see it.
[Dewey] It took a while

to come up
with our first song.

[♪ singing]
♪ Do-do-do-do-Dewey,
Dewey, Dewey! ♪

♪ Do-do Dewey.
What am I doing, Dewey? ♪

♪ Dewey, Dewey.
What is that smell? ♪
♪ It's Dewey ♪
[gulps]

[Cricket] But once Dewey took
a sip of water,

we had a golden window
of opportunity!
How about--

-[singing]
♪ We got some fame ♪
-♪ And fortune too! ♪

♪ But the most important thing
is friendship-- ♪
[all] ♪ Woo woo! ♪

And just like that,
we had a hit.
Wait! Before we sing it,

can we all promise we're never
going to let fame change us?

-Sure.
-Absolutely.
Okay, cool, we can sing now.

Quackstreet Boys were
brilliant performers,

so I did what any
talent manager would do.
Put them in tiny little boxes.

[Star] Scott was
the sensitive one.

Cricket, the bad boy,
Dewey the showboat,
and Barry was... the Barry.
What up, Quack Fam!

Welcome to the
Quackstreet Boys' private jet

that is definitely ours,
and not my famous,
wealthy uncle's.

We got sensitive Scotty
goin' through fan mail...
This one is a promposal!

Should I go?
What should I wear?
Are bowties still a thing?

-[Dewey] Bad boy Cricket's
kickin' stuff!
-Ow!
Could I get some ice?

This bad boy lifestyle
is making my toe sore.

[Dewey] And my bunny boy's
havin' an existential crisis!
No...
nope... not right.

What does it mean to be
The Barry?

We were so young back then,
so innocent...
Look! It's a carrier pigeon
with more fan mail!

-Let's let him in!
-[others] No! No! No!

Some critics questioned
if the boys were ready to go

on a planet-wide tour
with only one song...
but the real question was...
[sipping]
...was the Chibiverse ready?

Our tour was
a real roller coaster...

-[♪ drum music playing]
-...literally. Because
we were on a roller coaster.
♪ We got some fame ♪
♪ And fortune too ♪

♪ But the most important thing
is friendship ♪
[all] ♪ Woo woo! ♪
♪ Got a record deal ♪
♪ But let's be real ♪

♪ We'll never change the way
that we feel ♪

♪ Money and power
and best buds ♪

♪ All three things
are equally good ♪

♪ And now we're
selling out shows ♪
♪ Dancing in unison! ♪

♪ A group of four lovable
down-to earth hooligans! ♪

♪ The wild ride to stardom
has only just begun! ♪
♪ We got fame and fortune! ♪
♪ And also friendship! ♪

♪ Sure it's been weeks
since we've just hung out! ♪

♪ But it's worth hearing
all of our fans ♪
♪ Scream and shout! ♪

♪ Totally remember my friend's
names without a doubt! ♪
♪ We got fame and fortune! ♪
♪ What was the third thing? ♪

♪ Whoa-oh, we forgot
what the third thing was! ♪

They were unstoppable,
their music untoppable,

their Quackstreet Boys
branded popcorn?
Unpoppable!
[chomping]
But still a best-seller!
They were on top of the world.

When you're so high up,
you can only go... down.
What up, Quack Fam!

We're backstage
at the Chibi Music Awards,

where we just won
every single award.

And we're about to party!
[giggles]
Uh, guys, what's wrong?
Hello?

You can't just look into
the distance all sad!

[Cricket] My bad boy persona
and double foot casts

had turned me into the thing
I feared most.

-A fancy shoe style icon.
-[camera shutter clicking]
I got so much fan mail,

that I broke
the Chibiverse record
for most paper cuts!

They gave me the certificate
to prove it.
Ow! I got another one!

What if instead of
the Barry one,
I was... the scary one?

Aw, what pop group
has "a scary one"?
I can't do this anymore.

Maybe someone
should have stepped in,
given them a break.

But as their manager,
it wasn't my job to figure out
who that person would even be!

You three need to toughen up!
Or, I don't know,
manage your time better,
so my dreams can come true!

It's always me, me, me
with you isn't it!?

Don't be silly.
It's not you, you, you.

-It's me, me, me.
-What?

This band was supposed to be
about friendship!

Now all this fame stuff
ruined it!

You even took us
out of the poster--
ow papercut--

-can't even see us!
-[scoffs] It's not my fault

you're not using your
Quackstreet Boys branded
magnifying glass!
You changed, Dewey.

The one thing
we promised not to do.
Well, maybe change is good.
Like me changing this band
into a solo act!
You wouldn't!
He would.

Dewey had an...
interesting solo career
with hits like

"This Is Fun,"
"Actually, I Miss My Friends"
and "Why Did I Do This?"
Those boys were my best pals.

I didn't really
want to go solo.

I just wanted
their emotional validation.
But it's too late now.

Dewey, we'll always be
top tier dude bros,
after all...

we're all at the same
costume party!

Maybe we can still perform
one last time,
for old times' sake?
We only broke up a week ago,

I'm sure the Chibiverse
hasn't moved on that fast!
But alas, we had...
Wait, what? To who?
Chibis and gentle-chibis!

Please welcome
my favorite clients...
The Spice Squirrels!

[singing]
♪ If you wanna be my friend ♪

♪ You gotta be friends
with my friends! ♪

But wait, only one of them
is a squirrel?
That makes no sense!
[♪ theme music playing]
